src.dataset package¶

Submodules¶

src.dataset.random_seq module¶

class src.dataset.random_seq.RandomGeneratedSequences(path_to_csvs, num_of_event_types, num_of_steps, predefined_step_size=False)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

This Dataset allows to work with different types of data in the same format: - real world dataset like AgeClusterData or LinkedIn or IPTV dasets, which consist real sequences of different events - generated data There are two types of generated random data based on Hawkes process
